articles.description: Anchor, a podcast-making app owned by Spotify, will now let you take recordings of video calls from Google Meet, Zoom, Skype, and more and turn those recordings into audio podcasts. The app supports .mp4 and .mov uploads.
articles.content: Your weekly Zoom hangout could be the next hit podcast

articles.title: Predator: Hunting Grounds Review - IGN
articles.description: Predator: Hunting Grounds offers brief moments of blockbuster action, but ultimately underwhelms more often than it excites.

articles.author: Jeremy Horwitz
articles.title: VR researchers show string haptic wearable that lets you feel objects - VentureBeat
articles.description: The latest effort to simulate touch within VR environments aims to replicate the sensations of interacting with large objects, railings, and walls.
articles.content: As companies continue to solve virtual realitys biggest hardware and software challenges, many researchers have been working on next-generation VR peripherals that will enable users to feel digital objects haptic gloves, exoskeletons, and even walking canes h… [+2208 chars]

articles.title: XCOM: Chimera Squad Review - GameSpot
articles.description: XCOM: Chimera Squad refines the series’ core tactical strengths to show that sometimes less is more. #XCOM #ChimeraSquad #GameSpotReview

articles.title: Command & Conquer could show us how a remaster should be done - PCGamesN
articles.description: Guided by fans, EA and Petroglyph have made an exhaustive attempt to add value above and beyond merely tweaking the graphics
articles.content: Less than two years ago, EA announced Command & Conquer: Rivals. I’m all for new ideas and all against the extreme things that people can threaten to do when they’re angry on the internet, but it’s not to legitimise that reaction to be genuinely confused … [+10008 chars]
